title: Commending the Capital One Bank upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the Beautification Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending the Capital One Bank upon the occasion
of  its  designation  as  recipient  of  the Beautification Award by the
Wantagh Chamber of Commerce on January 26, 2011

WHEREAS, It is the custom of this Legislative Body to honor those illus-
trious individuals and institutions of  the  State  of  New  York  whose
purposeful  endeavors  serve  to  enhance  the  quality of life in their
communities; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative Body is justly proud to commend
the Capital One Bank upon the occasion of its designation  as  recipient
of the Beautification Award by the Wantagh Chamber of Commerce; and
  WHEREAS,  The Capital One Bank will be recognized at the Wantagh Cham-
ber of Commerce Annual Installation Dinner Dance to be held  on  Wednes-
day, January 26, 2011, at Mulcahy's in Wantagh, New York; and
  WHEREAS,  Accepting  this  most prestigious honor on behalf of Capital
One Bank will be its Manager Karen Drummond; and
  WHEREAS, It is  with  great  admiration  that  this  Legislative  Body
applauds  the  efforts  of  all  the  individuals involved in this vital
organization, and to recognize their unwavering  devotion  to  improving
the quality of life for others; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  its  distinguished history, Capital One Bank has
diligently served the residents of Wantagh, New  York,  and  has  had  a
positive impact throughout the entire community; and
  WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body that when organiza-
tions of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to  our  atten-
tion,  they  should  be celebrated and recognized by all the citizens of
the great State of New York; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend  the  Capital  One  Bank upon the occasion of its designation as
recipient  of  the  Beautification  Award  by  the  Wantagh  Chamber  of
Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Capital One Bank.
